evidence_example.title: task_demo
evidence_example.small_descr: A minimal EE demo for the MONOSTACK case with the MPC5674F evaluation board. It runs under Lauterbach simulation environment.
evidence_example.long_descr:
Task demo: A minimal EE demo with the MPC5674F evaluation board. It runs under Lauterbach simulation environment. The demo uses the following peripherals:
  • LEDs;
  • Buttons;
The demo to tests the BCC1, BCC2, FP conformance class, TaskActivate, Schedule, and non preemptive settings.
